targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lat" or r._field == "lon" or r._field == "¬∞C" or r._field == "%" or r._field == "ppm" or r._field == "km/h" or r._field == "dB" or r._field == "Mw" or r._field == "mm/h")
  |> group(columns: ["location", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["location"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.lat > 0.0 and r.lon > 0.0)
  |> rename(columns: {"lat": "latitude", "lon": "longitude"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    display_pct: r["¬∞C"] / 30.0 * 100.0
  }))
  |> rename(columns: {
    "¬∞C": "Temperature (¬∞C)",
    "%": "Humidity (%)",
    "ppm": "CO‚ÇÇ (ppm)",
    "km/h": "Traffic Speed (km/h)",
    "dB": "Noise (dB)",
    "Mw": "Seismic (Mw)",
    "mm/h": "Rain (mm/h)",
    "display_pct": "üìà % of Threshold"
  })

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Active Sensors"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

thresholds = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "thresholds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> last()
  |> group()

sensors = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid", "type"])
  |> last()
  |> group()

join(tables: {s: sensors, t: thresholds}, on: ["type"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value_s > r._value_t)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value_s, _field: "Violations"}))
  |> group()
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Violations"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if (1200.0 - r._value) / 800.0 * 100.0 > 100.0 then 100.0 else if (1200.0 - r._value) / 800.0 * 100.0 < 0.0 then 0.0 else (1200.0 - r._value) / 800.0 * 100.0, _field: "Air Quality"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: int(v: r._time) / 1000000, _field: "Last Update"}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "¬∞C")

  |> mean()

  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "¬∞C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

import "array"

last_threshold = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "thresholds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

val = (last_threshold |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

array.from(rows: [
  {_time: v.timeRangeStart, _value: val, _field: "‚ö†Ô∏è Threshold"},
  {_time: now(), _value: val, _field: "‚ö†Ô∏è Threshold"}
])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)

import "array"

last_threshold = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "thresholds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "rain_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()

val = (last_threshold |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

array.from(rows: [
  {_time: v.timeRangeStart, _value: val, _field: "‚ö†Ô∏è Threshold"},
  {_time: now(), _value: val, _field: "‚ö†Ô∏è Threshold"}
])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

thresholds = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "thresholds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> last()
  |> group()

sensors = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group()

join(tables: {s: sensors, t: thresholds}, on: ["type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time_s,
      _value: r._value_s / r._value_t * 100.0,
      _field: r.type
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group(columns: ["location", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if r._value > 0 then 0 else 1,
      _field: r.location + " ‚Äî " + r.type
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

thresholds = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "thresholds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> last()
  |> group()

sensors = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group()

join(tables: {s: sensors, t: thresholds}, on: ["type"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value_s > r._value_t)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Time: string(v: r._time_s),
      Value: r._value_s,
      Threshold: r._value_t,
      Unit: r._field_s,
      Sensor: r.sensorid,
      Location: r.location,
      Type: r.type
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)
  |> keep(columns: ["Time", "Value", "Threshold", "Unit", "Sensor", "Location", "Type"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "severity_level")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Emergency Status"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Total Events"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "severity_level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.emergency_type != "none")
  |> group(columns: ["emergency_type", "location"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.emergency_type + " @ " + r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.emergency_type != "none")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Time: string(v: r._time),
      Type: r.emergency_type,
      Location: r.location,
      Severity: r.severity,
      Active: r._value
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)
  |> keep(columns: ["Time", "Type", "Location", "Severity", "Active"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> keep(columns: ["location"])
  |> distinct(column: "location")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> keep(columns: ["location"])
  |> distinct(column: "location")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"])
